div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1445 Asia Minor, before 1951 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (M) Contents: 40+ AR Alexander III: lifetime and early post. dr. (Abydus 1, Lampsacus 4, Colophon 4, Magnesia 1, Miletus 1, Teos 1, unc. mints 28) Disposition: Ankara 40 (inv. nos. 640-1, 643-5, 648-77, 720-4) Information from Saadet Taner
